title: "Viral Wall Art"
content:
**Welcome to Viral Wall Art!**

Our website is dedicated to providing you with the most unique and eye-catching wallpapers for your desktop or mobile device. Our collection features a variety of abstract shapes and designs inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a sleek black background.

Whether you're looking to add some edge to your personal device or spice up your work computer, our selection of wallpapers is sure to impress. With our easy-to-use download system, you can have your new wallpaper up and running in no time.

At Viral Wall Art, we believe that art should be bold and daring, just like the digital world we live in. So why settle for a boring, plain background when you can showcase your style with one of our striking designs?

Browse our collection today and discover the perfect wallpaper to make your device stand out from the crowd.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
